programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Greg Pierson ei ole koskaan kayttanyt asetta, mutta lahtee nyt metsastamaan vuoristovuohia. Samalla toiset ryhmat keraavat ruokaa talven varalle.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Wild Mexico
programme.desc: Wild Mexico

programme.title: Villi Australia
programme.desc: Australian mantereella sijaitsee maailman suurin kesyton luonnonalue. Alkuperaiskansat ovat elaneet siella tarkkailemalla luontoa ja ottamalla siita oppia.

programme.title: Villi Australia
programme.desc: Australian mantereella sijaitsee maailman suurin kesyton luonnonalue. Alkuperaiskansat ovat elaneet siella tarkkailemalla luontoa ja ottamalla siita oppia.

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Modernin Dubain taakse katkeytyy salaisuus: uskomaton villi luonto, joka kantaa ajatonta yhteytta aavikkoon, mereen ja kansan historiaan ja perinteeseen.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Maailman teravimmat tutkijat, insinoorit, yrittajat ja keksijat etsivat mullistavia lapimurtoja kukin omalla erikoisalallaan.

programme.title: Saba And The Rhinos Secret
programme.desc: Seikkaileva villielainten asiantuntija Saba Douglas-Hamilton lahtee erikoiselle matkalle: paljastamaan sarvikuonon todellisen luonteen ja salaisen elaman.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 10. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Scaled
programme.desc: Greg ja Lucas vierailevat perheessa, joka haluaa ensimmaiselle matelijalleen saluuna-teemaisen terraarion. Tyrone, Jason, Chris ja Lucas kilpailevat hauskimmasta meemi-kuvasta.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 4/11. Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan. (Saved By The Barn, tosi-tv, USA, 2020)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayden ja Brettin perheet kilpailevat siita, kumpi rakentaa hurjimman ja erikoisimman lammikon takapihalleen - ja vain yksi voi voittaa!

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n elainlaakarit hoitavat huskyn niskassa olevaa syvaa haavaa. Kaksi koiraa pelastetaan hylatylta takapihalta, jonne ne oli jatetty myrskyn jalkoihin ilman suojaa.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n virkailijat epailevat, etta eras mies kasvattaa koiranpentuja kellarikerroksessa Philadelphiassa. Olosuhteet ovat ala-arvoiset, ja tiimi aikoo lopettaa touhun.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 10/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, lifestyle, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Ystavykset matkaavat syvalle Sambiaan tiikerikalasta tehtyjen havaintoja seuraten. Edessa on liki 650 kilometria soratieta, krokotiileja, virtahepoja ja pulaa polttoaineesta.

programme.title: Canopy Kings
programme.desc: Puumajoja tilaustyona rakentava Django Kroner aloittaa uuden rakennuksen Kentuckyssa. Asiakas haluaa majan yli 20 metrin korkeuteen, joten Django lahtee ottamaan oppia sirkuksesta.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Gregilla ja Dinalla on kolme suloista lasta ja yksi ilkea kissa nimelta Mia. Chris ja Tenille eivat pysty muuttamaan yhteen Tenillen vihamielisen kissan tahden.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: ! Kausi 1, osa 1. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Joukkueen jasen on poissa pelista, ja Russellin ja Mireyan on jatkettava vihjeiden etsimista keskenaan. Ensimmaiset potentiaaliset todisteet isojalasta loytyvat.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.desc: Patikoimassa ollut metsanvartija sattuu samalle polulle puuman kanssa. Vihainen supikoira hyokkaa koiranulkoiluttajan paalle Vancouverissa.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Elainsuojelujarjesto Animal Defenders International on tyoskennellyt 40 vuotta sirkuselainten kieltamiseksi. Suurimmat pelastusoperaatiot tapahtuvat Perussa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.title: Bronxin elaintarha
programme.desc: Nuori lumileopardi ei pysty kavelemaan kunnolla ja uhkaa jaada pysyvasti liikuntavammaiseksi. Elaintarhanhoitajat rakentavat uutta aitausta gaselleille.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Kesan kunniaksi tiimi jarjestaa autonpesutempauksen, jolla kerataan varoja lehmille ja aaseille. Dan lahtee peiteoperaatioon loukkaantunutta vuohta pelastamaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff ja tiimi matkustavat syrjaiselle paikkakunnalle pitamaan maksutonta vastaanottoa. Elainlaakari Petra pelastaa hataleikkauksella auton alle jaaneen bassetin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: San Francisco Giants haluaa siirtaa palasen McCovey Coven satama-aluetta pelikentalle. Osaavatko pojat rakentaa akvaarion, joka on tarpeeksi iso hammastyttaakseen uskolliset fanit?

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA haluaa oikeutta auttamilleen elaimille. Silla on eri puolilla osavaltiota yhdeksan agenttia, jotka hoitavat kaikkea kissoista ja koirista hevosiin, matelijoihin ja karhuihin.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Uuden-Meksikon kuivalla Tinajan aavikolla Bradley ja Billy jahtaavat jattimaista scolopendra-tuhatjalkaista. Myrkkykynsilla varustettu otus on vasymaton tappaja.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Hyppaa Pete Nelsonin kanssa kulissien taakse ja nae hanen ennen esittamattomia Treehouse Masters -lempihetkia. Mukana on myos paljon kadonnutta kuvamateriaalia.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia, Tania ja Mariah muistelevat kaikkein hellyttavimpia hetkia. Matkalla on ollut yllattavia pelastusoperaatioita, liikuttavia jalleennakemisia ja sydanta lammittavia adoptioita.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Nelja perhetta elaa eristyksessa kaukana toisistaan, ankarissa arktisissa olosuhteissa ja villin luonnon armoilla maailman viimeisiin suuriin eramaihin kuuluvassa Alaskassa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 11/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, lifestyle, USA, 2019)

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Jouluna kavelylla olleet isa ja tyttaret joutuvat kengurun hyokkayksen kohteeksi. Leijona vetaa naisen jalat kaltereiden toiselle puolelle elainten suojelukeskuksessa.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Katherine Connor johtaa perheineen norsujen pelastuskeskusta Thaimaassa. Nainen haluaa vapauttaa kahleista vanhan Pang Fai -nimisen norsun sen loppuelamaksi.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Hyppaa Pete Nelsonin kanssa kulissien taakse ja nae hanen ennen esittamattomia Treehouse Masters -lempihetkia. Mukana on myos paljon kadonnutta kuvamateriaalia.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA haluaa oikeutta auttamilleen elaimille. Silla on eri puolilla osavaltiota yhdeksan agenttia, jotka hoitavat kaikkea kissoista ja koirista hevosiin, matelijoihin ja karhuihin.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: New investigations at Pompeii reveal a dark underbelly of lawlessness, murder and political intrigue. Could this explain the mystery of dozens of bodies found sheltering in a warehouse? 3/6

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Wildfires in Oregon, flash floods in Arizona, a family survive the most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippines and a story of survival in sub-zero temperatures for seven days in the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue is on the hunt for food, but shell have to compete with a wily fox. Jessies puppies embark on their first big camping trip, and Ricko crashes his snowmobile.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Ed Gamble and Lou Sanders have been friends for years, so much so that shes bought a his n hers set of driving gloves to tackle their most dangerous road - 1000 kilometres of Iceland. 5/8

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Dr Michael Mosley travels the world to meet extraordinary superagers. In this episode about the appearance, Michael is in Los Angeles to meet a 71-year-old with amazing, wrinkle free skin.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: In British Columbia, our trio must work out how to catch a Coho Salmon without becoming a grizzlys dinner.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Wildfires in Oregon, flash floods in Arizona, a family survive the most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippines and a story of survival in sub-zero temperatures for seven days in the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve goes in search of the deadliest cats in Africa in the carnivore capital of Zambia. He gets up close to the rulers of the Savannah - the lions and leopards.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: In a festive special, Rom visits the Sahara Desert. Guided by Bobo, a local of Berber descent, Rom discovers a place that is vast and inhospitable, and utterly beautiful. 5/5

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle journeys to the foothills of the Indian Himalayas to live with former fighter pilot, Steve Lall, who is now a mountain farmer.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones work to repair a vital piece of equipment for their hunting grounds. Sue Aikens contends with the dangers of the tundra while hunting for small game.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a colourful factory that produces 200,000 litres of paint and 10,000 metres of wallpaper every week.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: A look at the survival techniques of creatures that endure the harsh conditions of the Arctic and Antarctic. For animals at both poles, life is dominated by the annual retreat and advance of the freezing sea ice and the challenge of surviving winters when temperatures drop. In the Arctic the polar bear is the top predator, catching seals on the ice and forcing seabirds to nest high up on cliffs. In Antarctica the flightless penguins have no ground-based predators to deal with but lurking in the water is the constant threat from leopard seals. Narrated by David Attenborough.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In the Philippines, the Taal volcano violently erupts, blasting ash and spewing debris over nearby towns and villages. In Queensland, Australia, a freak hail storm unleashes a destructive assault on residents. In British Columbia, a snowmobile rider narrowly escapes death.

programme.title: The Future of Nature
programme.desc: Discussion about the impact grasslands have on capturing carbon.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley travels across two of the most enigmatic countries in the Caribbean - Cuba and Haiti. Joanna kicks off her adventure in the back of a classic car in Havana, outlining her 1500-mile Caribbean adventure.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones are faced with a life-or-death decision in high tide. Ricko DeWilde enlists the aid of his children to maintain the family homestead. 16/16

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the canyons of Utah to meet 72-year-old twins Bill and Bob Stone, who fled their adrenaline-junkie pasts for a tough subsistence lifestyle as they also deal with the challenges associated with growing old. He joins the brothers as they go cattle-wrangling, rock climbing and skydiving, while Ben also discovers more about them and why they decided to cut themselves off from civilisation. Once parachute instructors, police informants and bounty hunters, they are now organic farmers who are preparing for doomsday.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates a natural history of the oceans. This programme explores seasonal changes in the richest waters on Earth, where the annual cycle of the sun drives an explosion of life. Featuring an extraordinary variety of marine animals, including seals, dolphins, jellyfish and the bizarre walking handfish.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness visits a factory that makes 4 million individual Belgian chocolates every day. Ruth discovers the origin of St Nicholas and later visits a chocolate museum.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Alaskans embrace change as winter loosens its icy grip on the Arctic.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets Jaimie, an eccentric inventor originally from Vermont who lives with his family on a group of islands he has bought off the coast of Panama. 7/12

programme.title: First Contact: An Alien Encounter
programme.desc: Part 1. Combining drama and documentary we imagine what might happen when humans detect the first indisputable evidence of extra-terrestrial civilisation. 1/2

programme.title: Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof
programme.desc: The celebrities are introduced to a surprise visitor thats close to Wims heart, and they face a powerful man-made blizzard in nothing but their swimwear. 3/6

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The team heads to the icy, barren mountains of Patagonia in search of a deep-sea delicacy, the Patagonian Toothfish, which sells for $100 per kilo in the fish markets of North America.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: All Romesh knows about Colombia is cocaine barons and for most of his life, that was more than enough to stop him wanting to visit. But is Colombias reputation for drug wars justified? 4/5

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In Texas and Mexico, the first Atlantic hurricane of the season makes landfall, creating dangerous flooding and widespread destruction. A tornado outbreak unleashes carnage on Oklahoma, Texas and Louisiana. In Utah, a brushfire threatens to engulf drivers as flames lick the freeway.

programme.title: The Future of Nature
programme.desc: Science documentary looking at how forest ecosystems reduce global carbon levels and effect climate.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti
programme.desc: Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Under winters shadow, Alaskans toil to secure scarce food and opportunity in the final fertile days of summer. Andy Bassich and Denise Becker reckon with the sudden loss of a vital resource.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets a 40-year-old former communications manager who gave up her old life to train huskies in the Swedish Arctic Circle. Gaynor and her husband Milos live in a hand-built cabin with no running water.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Amazingly beautiful and complex, coral reefs develop from humble beginnings. Tiny larvae settle and then over hundreds of years the intricate and fragile reefs that we so enjoy grow, inch by inch. Reefs are adorned with spectacularly colourful life, but it is no tropical paradise. Space is at a premium and even the coral itself fights to survive. And then, at night, the sharks come out to hunt. Layer upon layer the coral supports innumerable animals, but one big storm can threaten the entire community.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness is at the Warburtons factory where he worked as a teenager. 2/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Lessons are learned and personal battles are fought by Alaskans enduring winters descent. Chip and Agnes hailstone dig their boat out of the ice and Ricko Dewilde takes his two daughters on a hunt.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to the freezing coastal waters of Iceland to live with Hakon, a former carpenter who overcame alcohol and embraced a clean, solo life in the wilderness on an private island.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Sarjan toisessa jaksossa Richard Ayoade vie meidat viuhuen saalimattoman tehokkaalle lomalle Pariisiin. Yhdessa juontaja ja koomikko Mel Giedroycin kanssa he tukeutuvat viikonlopuksi eleganttiin hotelliin, joka tuli kuuluisaksi paikkana, jossa Oscar Wilde kuoli. Mutta tiukan aikataulun ja monien hoideltavien nahtavyyksien takia ei ole aikaa jaada hengailemaan ja imemaan itseensa kirjallista ilmapiiria, joten he kayvat suoraan kasiksi kulttuuriin upottautumiseen. Valttaen Eiffel-tornia pitkine hissijonoineen he suuntaavat Montparnassen torniin, josta on luultavasti parempi nakoala Pariisiin ja joka tarjoaa bonuksena Eiffel-tornin. He syovat vankan ranskalaisannoksen vasikanpaapataa ja etanoita kaupungin vanhimmassa kahvilassa ennen kiihdyttamista lyhyelle skootterikierrokselle. He suuntaavat absinttiin erikoistuneeseen baariin ja paattavat paivan siihen ennen kuin hallusinaatiot alkavat. Toisena paivana nahdaan Mel kuin kotonaan Le Cordon Bleun kokkikoulun keittion tutussa ymparistossa, jossa he osallistuvat kolmituntiseen tyopajaan. Myohemmin katutaidekierros antaa heidan arvostaa taidetta ilmaiseksi ja samalla tutustua viela yhteen kaupungin alueeseen. Richard ikuistaa matkan eksklusiivisella matkamuistolla.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Richard Ayoaden kanssa 48 tunniksi Tanskan tyylitietoiseen paakaupunkiin Koopenhaminaan lahtee Noel Fielding. Pyoraily on suosiossa Koopenhaminassa, joten he liittyvat pyorailykierrokselle paastakseen vauhtiin ja nahdakseen niin monta nahtavyytta kuin mahdollista laskeutumatta pyoran selasta, mutta edes he eivat pysy nopean matkaoppaan vauhdissa. Yhdessa he syovat paikallisia voileipia ja pysahtyvat tanskalaisille leivonnaisille kaupungin vanhimpaan leipomoon. Juomat tulevat tuoppien muodossa Carlsbergin panimomuseossa, jossa he osallistuvat gastronomisiin oluen maistajaisiin. He saavat jannitysta Tivolissa, maailman viidenneksi vanhimmassa huvipuistossa, jossa pelottomat matkaajat menevat suoraan puiston suosituimpaan laitteeseen Rutschebaneniin, 102-vuotiaaseen puiseen vuoristorataan. He tutustuvat joihinkin Koopenhaminan katkettyihin jalokiviin, kuten Cisternsiin, maanalaiseen nayttelytilaan, ja uskaltautuvat itsehallintoiseen Christianian hippien turvapaikkaan. Kun heidan aikansa Tanskan paakaupungissa on paattymassa, he suuntaavat Rundetaarniin, Euroopan vanhimpaan observatorioon tuomaroimaan Koopenhaminaa ja yhteista aikaansa.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin investigate a missing classmate, they discover a far greater mystery . . . about Elmore. Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. So that together they can infiltrate Ferals camp and get back whats theirs. For Feral also stole a precious item from Cupcake... one that exerts a strange hold over him - "The Squeak of Obedience!"

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: Whilst travelling through the notoriously dangerous Forest of Outlaws, Prince Ivandoe is repeatedly Princenapped! First by a gang of wolves in disguise, then by Boaris and his Merry Boars, and finally by Feral and her gang of cat-thieves - all of them hoping to secure a royal ransom. Luckily for Prince Ivandoe and Bert, they are rescued by the fair Jezabel - though, as it turns out, not with the noblest of intentions.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball needs to find a cure for Darwin’s allergy before he sneezes Elmore off the map. Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to discover that Anais is Dad’s favourite child. Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favorites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad . . .

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwins conversation dries up they worry that their friendship is coming to an end. They try to find ways to get the conversation flowing again but nothing seems to work. Maybe they have just grown apart?

programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwins conversation dries up they worry that their friendship is coming to an end. They try to find ways to get the conversation flowing again but nothing seems to work. Maybe they have just grown apart?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep offers to look after the Golden Compost while Sushi-Mushi is away. But it smells so delicious that the Mushables will do anything to taste it. Its up to Chep to stop them!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle comes across something Mush-Mush has made, she declares him a genius artist! But Mush-Mush is not sure thats the kind of genius he wants to be.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Bolly can take a break and head off to have fun, our Mushlers insist that they will do all the repairs around Mushton for him. Now Bolly needs to fix all their repairs!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone realizes that they dont actually know what Fung and Miffs special gifts are! So Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out without Fung and Miff knowing.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has created a cloak out of a leaf, and Chanterelle thinks its super fashionable. But when she makes a similar cloak to Cheps, a fashion rivalry is born!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To finally bring life-long friends Mushpot and Starmush back together, Truff goes to help Starmush succeed at an impossible challenge set by Musho…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When things go missing from everyone’s home-trees, our Mushlers get on the case to catch the culprit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Morel notices a Mushlet who is too shy to join in with the others. He realizes why the Mushlet is so shy -- they are in awe of Mush-Mush. Morel gets Mush-Mush to boost the Mushlets confidence.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep discovers he is great at giving snails massages. But the Food and Travel Snails now want massages all the time. Exhausting! Chep has to learn how to tell them NO!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasn’t danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesn’t dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings shave ice from the icefield and whip it into granita, but the result is flavorless. He decides to make granita in an empty jar of Yummy so that the chocolate left over on the sides of the jar will flavor the dessert. It’s delicious! The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-l’oeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where they’d hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunia’s Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far, and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build “hog.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesn’t want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburg’s pier. The crew gets so caught up trying to win the games that they lose sight of what matters.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take the scouts on a camping trip to canyon country and get more than they bargained for when a coyote pup shows up.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when they try to shoo away a seemingly docile spider.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates which places his defense of the Butlers Linen Gloves Boxing Title in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry pretends to be a ghost to terrorize Tom -- until he gets a fright of his own.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger forget Toms birthday the tomcat moves in with the one person who appreciates him the local Zoos gorilla Cuddles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the Tom Thumb story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs And Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean would like to learn to play a Beethoven symphony, so he arranges a piano, a music book, a candlestick and a very patient piano teacher. It can be done this way too, Liberace!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A music video introducing all of Batmans heroic vehicle squad -- the Batwheels -- and showcasing their incredible gadgets, stunning talents and unique personalities.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China, but the crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favourite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critter’s arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overly ambitious young house sitter ruins Toms plans to rule the roost while Rick and Ginger are away. Jerry relishes in Toms predicament, that is until the house sitter spots the mouse and he becomes enemy number one!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few "dead ends."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A sales representative offers Tom all sorts of materials to finally catch Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom breaks his leg during a chase.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie are fed up with Tom and threaten to get a "real" witchs cat: a black cat. In desperation, Tom takes a magic potion that makes him turn black but only temporarily. He has to keep up the disguise for the witches - but maybe they know more than they let on.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The pets start hoarding food so they wont run out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry and Napoleon play around with Bigbys brand-new anti-gravity machine ... until Tom breaks into the lab and a chase begins. The machine wrecks havoc on the entire lab, including the cafeteria.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. It’s up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gotham’s Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman, Robin, and Batgirl are all captured, the Batcomputer brings the Bat-Vehicles to life. Now the newly-minted Batwheels must defend the Batcave and face off with the Legion of Zoom… all without Batman’s help!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Batman, Robin, and Batgirl unreachable, Batcomputer brings Batman’s trusty Batmobile, Bam, to life to help protect the Batcave from a mysterious intruder.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam discovers a villainous vehicle squad - the Legion of Zoom - is on the loose and preparing to storm the Batcave. In need of reinforcements, Batcomputer brings the rest of Batman’s Bat-vehicles to life, and the newly minted Batwheels must learn how to work together as a team to protect the Batcave!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buff befriends Mr Freezes snowcrawler Snowy, the other Batwheels bristle at the thought of hanging out with a "bad guy" so Buff sets out to change their minds.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman – and the mission – are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbird’s beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didn’t go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. It’s up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gotham’s Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When all of the Batwheels (except for Bam) mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M, the original Batmobile, to help save his friends. Along the way, Bam comes to appreciate the old-school mobiles different crimefighting style as they team up to take on the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry lose Gingers wedding ring down the drain, they send Jerry through the pipes to retrieve it, but the drain leads out to the beach!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby creates an amazing helmet that accidentally turns Tom into a genius. Napoleon, Jerry and Hamster all work together to take down the newly smart Tom who is now building a mouse-destroying weapon.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is put in charge of getting the manors dog into showdog shape, unfortunately Jerry will try to sabotage him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Lady of the Houses cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesnt catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Gingers yard sale. A woman who thinks hes a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down… especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Marvin the Martian and his Martian crew a space station. / The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvesters back. They build Zippy a flea circus to try and convince him to relocate and relieve Sylvesters itch.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build an outdoor movie theater in the park. / The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvester’s back.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Having just gone out to have a great picnic, the Tinkers are surprised by the rain and have to retreat inside; while the team is desperate to find something to do, Porky has a genius idea.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Thanks to a mysterious bag of magic beans, Bugs meets Elmer, a gentle giant who would like to build a castle in the clouds; its the perfect mission for DIYers.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, it’s up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from stealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take their chase to the skies. Kite-flying has never been this intense. Who will emerge as the ultimate master of strings?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie gets sick, our Mushlers find it impossible to believe that she turns into the most demanding Mushable ever. Well, theyre about to find out that its all true!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung finds out that to earn a delicious treat from Sushi-Mushi you just need to look after the Food Snail for him. No problem! Actually, it becomes a huge problem for Fung!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot is too tired to give anyone advice, he asks Mush-Mush to answer the Mushables requests on his behalf. But now Mush-Mush thinks he is the leader of Mushton!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep thinks he has remembered that he is younger than his two best friends, Mush-Mush and Lilit, it affects his whole confidence.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are ecstatic: Muddlers fear of spiders rid the forest of him! But they soon learn that even Muddler is essential to the health of the forest.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit looks up to Chanterelle as an awesome role model. She would so love to be like her one day. But when she starts imitating Chanterelle it doesn’t go to plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone.
