Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers -- one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend, and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a ‘forest song’, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mâche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzy’s TV. But it doesn’t take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: it’s an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Ranger’s cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzy’s feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. It’s up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gotham’s Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gotham’s annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized “Best in Show” ribbon. Sensing she’s up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a float to lead the Flower Parade, but Porky won’t settle for anything less than Porky Perfect.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg. Bugs and Daffy soon get caught up trying to prove their part of the coaster is the best.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sam Sheepdog hires The Looney Builders to build him a salon. Sam offers his custom cut only to learn that different folks want different styles. / Pro snowboarder Pepper Polar Bear hires The Looney Builders to build a ski resort. Pepper soon learns that others have different skill levels.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: There has been a wave of sock thefts from the local laundromat and the Cat and Mouse Detectives have been hired by Pontius Pig to solve the case before his laundry business goes belly up.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A prehistoric Cave Cat arrives at Rick and Gingers House.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Maude tasks Tom with guarding her prize pumpkin until she enters it into competition at the county fair.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A battle for control erupts after a genie emerges from a lamp that Ginger brought home from a yard sale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse Detectives are hired to track down Tuffys imaginary scapegoat, Mr. Nobody.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. He will finally be able to rid of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To make sure that the Lemmings dont snatch his chocolate spread while hes taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. The Lemmings try in vain to break into the fridge until they see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking. Unfortunately, Grizzy wakes up at the crucial moment. The Lemmings do everything possible to make him fall back asleep as quick as possible.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks hes a rodent! He tries to get the gang to adopt him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. It’s time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. It’s up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gotham’s Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Manny wants to play some games, but all Squirm wants to do is paint. Manny decides to take things into his own hands when Squirm refuses to play along.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their fast customer, Speedy Gonzalez. / As The Looney Builders help Petunia build a greenhouse, she can’t wait for the veggies to grow and does everything she can to speed up the process.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder, then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside, until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a re-match.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks taken up painting to help him relax. Although hes warned them to stay out of his studio, Tom and Jerry inadvertently destroy his first painting. In an effort to reproduce it before he returns home, Tom and Jerry end up in a competition to prove whos the better artist. May the best Renoir win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry try to locate a dog somewhere in the city, whose barking is keeping them awake.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks installed a state-of-the-art home automation system.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The witches ghost nephew throws a giant ghost party.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Bigby invents an asteroid buster, which Jerry uses for fun. Tom accidentally gives himself electrical superpowers after causing a power outage, and now Jerry must fend off Tom while fighting off an asteroid heading right toward their lab. Plus, Napoleon is stuck in a vending machine during the power outage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dutch to find his missing cursed ruby.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom eats some canned cheese that has gone bad and hallucinates. He then gets all sorts of visitors from the Tom and Jerry worlds. Tom must become a better cat to end the nightmare.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer. / On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins in Gotham City to life, creating an army of candy-gobbling Snack-O-Lanterns!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batcomputer shuts down for a system update, the other Batwheels must take over for her while aiding Batman in a battle against Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball," but the Kitty "Kitty" is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname "Tough Buff." But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A music video introducing all of Batmans heroic vehicle squad -- the Batwheels -- and showcasing their incredible gadgets, stunning talents and unique personalities.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is stuck in the lab with a dangerous robot on the loose! It’s up to the combined effort of the two Docs and the entire Lab team to save him before it is too late.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are on holiday and board a high-speed train only to realise that Lamput is also on the same train, except he’s in First Class! During the train journey, the Docs try to get from Coach into First Class but are refused entry by the train’s Captain. They then disguise themselves as train staff and finally get in, ready to capture the unsuspecting Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs and Lamput are excited because the FunFair is in town! But after the Docs cause havoc for the Carnival Clown during his juggling act, Lamput tries to make things right. The Clown is delighted in his new found friend and the two of them disappear into his House of Fun, with the Docs giving chase. But not all is as it seems inside the mysterious fun house, and the Docs have to come up with a cunning plan to capture Lamput and avoid upsetting the Clown any more!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesn’t trust.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer. / On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins in Gotham City to life, creating an army of candy-gobbling Snack-O-Lanterns!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom breaks his leg during a chase.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie are fed up with Tom and threaten to get a "real" witchs cat: a black cat. In desperation, Tom takes a magic potion that makes him turn black but only temporarily. He has to keep up the disguise for the witches - but maybe they know more than they let on.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom accidentally visits a bizarre twin version of his house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry dreams of a life where he is the lord of the manor, and Tom is the servant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerrys mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriends friend for a double date.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerrys country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids’ dance recital. / It’s Taz’s birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesn’t want to take it slow and practice.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunia’s Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far, and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build “hog.”

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi enters the world of The Wizard of Oz, where she meets familiar vehicle friends and goes on an amazing quest to see the wizard himself! / Bibi enters the world of The Wizard of Oz, where she meets familiar vehicle friends and goes on an amazing quest to see the wizard himself!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi enters the world of The Wizard of Oz, where she meets familiar vehicle friends and goes on an amazing quest to see the wizard himself!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. / Condiment King takes advantage of no Batwheels being on patrol to unleash a barrage of ketchup and mustard on an unsuspecting Gotham.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! The rest of the Batwheels must learn how to use their big new bodies to undo the wish!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has a bad feeling. There is something he knows he should remember but can’t. When he finally pieces his memories together, he gets what his bad feeling was about – Mushton is about to be attacked by a plague of hungry woodworms! Prepare the defences!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When the old Rooster Beetle comes to the end of his crowing days, everyone worries for Mush-Mush. ‘Rooster’ is Mush-Mush’s favourite. But Mush-Mush insists he is fine when everyoneknows he is not. So Mushpot and Starmush help him understand that it’s okay to show hisfeelings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends "favourite play tree" the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it. Does Lilit tell the truth or does she just carry on pretending to like it?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look. And now everyone is using their adorable power to get Mushpie to do what they want!

programme.title: Unlocked

programme.title: Meet the Press with Chuck Todd
programme.desc: "Meet the Press" is Americas most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. programme.title: Building Off The Grid
programme.desc: Perhe rakentaa unelmiensa maanalaista kotia Virginiaan. Kun kuljetukset ovat myohassa ja saat huonot, tuleeko unelmista ikina totta?

programme.title: Arvokaman etsijat
programme.desc: Drew ja Al kayvat lapi kiertolaiselamaa viettavan huvipuistoperheen kokoelmia. Sitten heidat kutsutaan perinteiseen puunveistoyritykseen.

programme.title: Arvokaman etsijat
programme.desc: Drew ja Viki tekevat kauppaa tinkaavan rautasepan kanssa Yorkshiressa. Sitten he kayvat 1800-luvun maalaiskartanossa Skotlannin etelarannikolla.

programme.title: Miten kaikki tehdaan?
programme.desc: Kausi 11, osa 8. Nykymaailma on taynna monimutkaisia tuotanto- ja valmistusprosesseja. Nopeatahtisessa sarjassa juontajat Pat OBrien ja Dorothy Lucy avaavat eri alojen asiantuntijoiden kanssa, miten kaikki oikein tehdaan. (How Do They Do It?, dokumenttisarja, Kanada ja Iso-Britannia, 2013)

programme.title: Kullan sukeltajat
programme.desc: Kris Kellyn tavoite kultasaaliista on vaakalaudalla vakavan loukkaantumisen takia. Herra Gold ottaa riskin pohjoisten tuulien ja laskuveden kanssa, mika tuo muhkeat palkkiot.

programme.title: Kultakuume: Parkerin kultareitti
programme.desc: Erikoisjakso. Kaivettuaan 7 miljoonan dollarin edesta kultaa, Parker haluaa vielakin kovemman haasteen: kaivautua Guyanan Etela-Amerikan kullanvarisiin viidakoihin ja oppia kullankaivuusta lisaa paikallisilta. Mutta hanen pitkaaikainen ykkosmiehensa Rick on aikeissa pudottaa kunnon uutispommin. (Gold Rush: Parkers Trail, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Espanjan rajavartijat
programme.desc: Virkailijoiden pysayttamat matkustajat asettuvat puolustuskannalle El Paratin lentokentalla. Kuorma-auton pohjapiilosta loytyy jotain Algecirasissa.

programme.title: Espanjan rajavartijat
programme.desc: Kaksi matkustajaa salakuljettaa laittomia aineita Bajarasin lentokentalla. Hermostunut matkustaja jaa kiinni vaarennetyn tavaran kanssa El Paratissa.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Huonokuntoiset klassikkoautot saavat Mike Brewerin ja Edd Chinan osaavissa kasissa uuden elaman. Mikella on ehtymaton vainu loytaa romun seasta helmet, minka jalkeen mekaanikko Edd pistaa tuulemaan. Kunnostuksen jalkeen kaksikon tavoitteena on myyda uusiutunut menopeli voitolla eteenpain.

programme.title: Bitchin Rides

programme.title: Alaska: Viimeinen rintama

programme.title: Hoffmanin perheen kultakuume
programme.desc: Todd Hoffman palaa kaivoksille. Han pistaa kaikki saastonsa kunnianhimoiseen hankkeeseen, jolla on tarkoitus elvyttaa ransistynyt kaivos Alaskan Nomessa.

programme.title: Hoffmanin perheen kultakuume
programme.desc: Kaivoskautta on jaljella vain viikko ja Hoffmanit pitavat kiiretta paastakseen tavoitteeseensa. Kylma saa ja hupeneva palkkapussi uhkaavat pilata mahdollisuudet.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Scientists have discovered a mysterious ninth planet on the very edge of our solar system. Ten times the size of Earth, this strange world could have moons with extraterrestrial life.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The Universe is a violent and dangerous place. From exploding stars and colliding galaxies to nebula shockwaves - what are the worst places in the Universe?

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Astronauts are evacuated when a mystery object is discovered hurtling towards the ISS. Plus, a secret agent goes undercover to recover missing moon rocks.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Astronomers find evidence for alien technology around a distant star. Then, pictures of Pluto show that something might be moving across its surface, and Apollo astronauts see something inexplicable as they approach the moon.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Deep
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade goes inside a cutting-edge archaeological investigation that is unearthing brand-new discoveries about Noah’s Ark; as experts get closer to finding its final resting place, they reveal the long-lost secrets of this famous vessel.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Deep
programme.desc: A sunken Nazi submarine packed with toxic cargo is a ticking timebomb that could put the whole world at risk. Jeremy Wade reveals the subs top-secret mission on the day it sank.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they turn English willow into cricket bats for Indias top players? How do they craft stunning hand-made Spanish fans? And, how do they build foundations for tall buildings?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they build a tractor every three minutes to power Indian agriculture? How do they cast the bronze bells that help Swiss farmers keep track of their cows?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: See how millions of real nests are collected to make birds nest soup. Also, aerospace technology makes rowers go faster and see how Spanish flamenco castanets are created.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: The power of the worlds biggest engines are quadrupled with turbochargers. Also, new roads are built from old plastic waste and see how one particular style of kite has become the national symbol of Malaysia.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Discover how ceramic grills and pneumatic punching machines are constructed. Also, explore how water jet fountains are made and see how wooden surfboards are crafted.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items go under the microscope. How are objects including vibrating mining screens, roller conveyors, whoopie pies and wood utility poles made?

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: How are exercise bikes, Cornish pasties, pasta makers, and slate products made?

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items go under the microscope. How are objects including channel signs and wetsuits made? Whats the construction behind aluminium aircraft?

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Ever wondered how a Morgan Aero Coupe was made? Join the How Its Made crew as they go to its birthplace, explore the inner workings and its gorgeous exterior.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: New discoveries reveal an astonishing supermassive black hole that was born during the earliest days of the cosmos, and finding out how this giant grew so large so quickly.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: A brand-new NASA mission to the Sun reveals cutting-edge discoveries about Earth’s star; as the Parker Solar Probe dives through the Sun’s atmosphere, what it finds challenges everything we know about this strange place.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The hidden kingdom of microscopic alien organisms shapes the universe as much as galaxies, stars, and planets; new discoveries reveal how bacteria, viruses, and other alien micro-organisms built life on Earth and influence humanity’s future in the cosmos.

programme.title: Extreme Engineering

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon

programme.title: Eesti mang
programme.desc: "Eesti mang" alustab uut hooaega ja esimeses mangus kohtuvad 70. sunnipaeva tahistava ETV legendaarsed eetrinaod. Saadet juhib alati rõõmsatujuline Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Pía uurib Romulolt, kas ta plaanib lahkuda. Markiis otsustab peo korraldada. Manuel nõuab Jimenalt lennukeelu kohta aru. Petra ei suuda Felicianole andestada.

programme.title: Kergejõustiku MM Tokyos
programme.desc: Kergejõustikusuvi kulmineerub maailmameistrivõistlustega Tokyos. Üheksa paeva jooksul jagatakse valja 49 medalikomplekti. Eesti koondise suurimad lootused on seotud kumnevõistlusega. Kommenteerivad Helar Osila ja Juhan Kilumets.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Evelini kulastab ootamatult linnapea, kes on temas pettunud. Laine on vaga õhevil, ta kohtab kaupluses Jurkat, kes saab teada, mis mange Ahven Marokos mangis. Ahven laheb Alma juurde, et saada temalt hotelli võtmekapi võti. Pille on koos Evaldiga Tallinnas, kohvikus kohtavad nad aga juhuslikult Evaldi endist abikaasat. Johannes kurdab peavalu. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama. Idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Feliciano ja Petra kuulevad halba uudist. Curro ei mõista Ramona põhjuseid. Catalina palub Pelayolt suudluse eest andeks. Jana teatab Abelile oma otsuse.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Dokumentaalsari jalgib Eesti venekeelse noorpaari reisi Ukrainasse, riiki, kus sõda ei ole pelgalt uudislugu, vaid igapaevane karm reaalsus. Ida-Virumaal, Ahtmes elava paari Anastasija ja Grigori maailmapilt on seni olnud tugevalt mõjutatud Venemaa propagandast, mis on tekitanud umbusku Laane narratiivide suhtes. Viime nad Ukrainasse, et nad saaksid vahetult kogeda, naha ja kuulda ning võimalusel korrigeerida seal oma uskumusi. Dokumentaalsari jalgib nende teekonda Tallinnast Kiievisse ja edasi Harkivisse, rindejooneni valja. Nad pole kunagi sõda isiklikult kogenud, see rannak pakub võimaluse seista silmitsi sõja tagajargede ja kannatanutega, inimestega, kes on kaotanud oma kodud, pered ning turvatunde. Lahendes rindepiirkonnale ja lõpuks ka rindejoonele, muutub kogemus uha isiklikumaks ning raskemaks. Olles hommikul Harkivi kortermaja juures, kus kaivad paastetood, elumaja on Vene raketitabamustega purustatud ja on hukkunud ka vaikesed lapsed ning tavalised inimesed venekeelsest Ukraina kogukonnast. Noorpaari senised uskumused pannakse tõsiselt proovile. Uurime, kas otsene kokkupuude sõjaga, olles Venemaa agressiooni all kannataval poolel, nahes oma silmaga vallutussõja havitustood ja ohvreid, võib muuta sarjas osalejate maailmapilti. Milline on su elu, kui sind saadab pidev ohufoon? Need vahetud kogemused avavad tee vaidlustele ja vestlustele osalejate ning Ukraina inimeste vahel ja pakuvad võimalusi võrrelda varasemaid arusaamu reisil kogetud tegelikkusega.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Kikepera soometsade taastamistood on sealse veerežiimi muutuste tõttu tekitanud avalikkuses palju poleemikat. Laheme koos teadlastega kaasa metsiseseirele ja selgitame, milline on sealsete taastamistoode mõju elustikule ja loodusele laiemalt. Mesilaspere edukus sõltub vastupidavast mesilasemast, nii on tema tervis ka mesiniku jaoks uks võtmekusimusi. Selleks, et aretada võimalikult haid mesilasemasid, viiakse nad pulmalennuks Naissaarele. Uurime, kuidas on aretuses abiks saare keskkond ja millised omadused peaks uhel mesilasemal olema. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Valisilm
programme.desc: Valispoliitilisi sundmusi ja Eesti valispoliitikat kommenteerivad ning analuusivad "Aktuaalse kaamera" valistoimetuse ajakirjanikud. Saatejuht Maria-Ann Rohemae.

programme.title: Skandinaavia. Uus kulm sõda
programme.desc: Venemaa kallaletung Ukrainale sundis 200 aastat neutraalsust sailitanud Skandinaavia riike oma senist valispoliitikat umber hindama. Soome, Rootsi ja Norra pole seni sõjavaele palju rõhku pannud, kuid nuud on neist saanud eesliin vastasseisus idanaabriga. Kolme riigi piir Venemaaga kulgeb labi Arktika, kus rikkalikud maavarad muutuvad kliima soojenemise tõttu uha kattesaadavamaks. Kuidas mõjutavad varsked pinged seda kauget kulma piirkonda, kus mõlema poole kohalikud elanikud on sõlminud uksteisega sooje suhteid?

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Humphrey ja Esther aitavad Shipton Abbotti naitetrupil mõrvamõistatuse peaproovi labi viia. Juhtub nii, et Paul Yellan, kes mangib etenduses mõrvatut, mõrvatakse pariselt. Et Yellan on Shipton Abbottis uustulnuk ja kogu trupp on kahtluse all, hakkavad uurijad minevikku lahti harutama. Humphrey ja Martha naudivad kohtinguid ning Anne suuvib veebikohtingutesse. Humphrey ja Martha elu võib muutuda, kui rahuldatakse nende taotlus hakata kasupereks.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 21. oktoobril 1978. aastal jõuti Eestis niikaugele, et uritati teha esimesi muusikavideosid - eks ikka Soome televisioonidest nahtud eeskujude jargi. Aga Soomest tuli palju rohkematki kui telepilt. Ning eestlane oli juba siis terava keele ja meelega... Autor ja saatejuht Reet Linna, režissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Mustamae tango
programme.desc: On 1980. aastate keskpaik Nõukogude Eestis ja paljud inimesed unistavad kõigi mugavustega uuest korterist Mustamae kortermajas. Erandiks pole ka baarmen Illar. Unistuse taideviimine pole aga sugugi lihtne, tuues kaasa erinevad mahhinatsioonid, kuhu on segatud emotsionaalne armuke, abivalmis miilits ja loomulikult ka Illari vahvast vuntsist paarimees Ats.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

Mesilaspere edukus sõltub vastupidavast mesilasemast, nii on tema tervis ka mesiniku jaoks uks võtmekusimusi. Selleks, et aretada võimalikult haid mesilasemasid, viiakse nad pulmalennuks Naissaarele. programme.title: IT-vaatlik
programme.desc: Kubermaailma võlusid kasutades võime sattuda erinevate pahatahtlike kavatsuste ohvriks. Kuidas parandada kuberturvalisust, margata ohumarke ja ennetada võimalikku kahju? Praktilist nõu, kuidas internetis turvaliselt toimetada, petukirju ara tunda, sotsiaalmeedias mõistlikult kaituda ja palju muud, jagavad oma ala spetsialistid. Saatejuht Katrin Viirpalu.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Feliciano ja Petra kuulevad halba uudist. Curro ei mõista Ramona põhjuseid. Catalina palub Pelayolt suudluse eest andeks. Jana teatab Abelile oma otsuse.

programme.title: Kergejõustiku MM Tokyos
programme.desc: Kergejõustikusuvi kulmineerub maailmameistrivõistlustega Tokyos. Üheksa paeva jooksul jagatakse valja 49 medalikomplekti. Eesti koondise suurimad lootused on seotud kumnevõistlusega. Kommenteerivad Helar Osila ja Juhan Kilumets.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Johannest, kes viibib haiglas Jane hoolitseva kae all, tulevad vaatama Alma ja samuti ka Kristjan, kes palub kõik oma patud andeks. Johannesel on lastehaigus - viiruseline mononukleoos. Richard seletab Jauramile, miks Eesti riigis pole loomapidamisel mõtet. Jurka maksab Ahvenale julmalt katte. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama. Idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Solsidan
programme.desc: Anna tahab pustijalakoomikuks hakata. Fredde ja Mickan vaatavad filmi, kus on armukolmnurk, ja see tekitab Freddes huvi. Ove ja Anette hakkavad eelkooli pidama.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Manuel tahaks Jimena La Promesast minema saata. Catalina annab Margaritale nõu. Lopet hairib koogist eemal viibimine aina rohkem. Romulo on Mauroga jatkuvalt vaga karm.

programme.title: Valimisstuudio
programme.desc: Juba 19. oktoobril toimuvad kohaliku omavalitsuse valimised. Viiel jarjestikusel teisipaeva õhtul selgub Eesti Televisoooni "Valimisstuudios", millistel kandidaatidel on parimad ideed oma kodukandi elu parandamiseks. Esimeses saates osalevad kaheksa erakonna esindajad, et vaidelda nende valimiste peateemade ule. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk ja Liisu Lass.

programme.title: Queen of F*cking Everything
programme.desc: Probleemid tabavad Lindat too juures, kui Koistinen, Marke elukaaslase Spora kriminaalne aripartner, ilmub akitselt uhte korterit vaatama. Parast korteri muuki Koistise bossile Borjele soostub Linda viimasega õhtusoogile minema. Kui ta hiljem leiab peidetud uimastid, mida Koistinen taga ajab, otsib Linda Laurilt, tootult endiselt kolleegilt abi remondifirma asutamiseks.

programme.title: Eesti (taielik ja kontrollitud) ajalugu
programme.desc: Taasiseseisvunud Eesti oli paik, kus kiirelt tarkas palju lootust. Kuid peagi jargnes igapaevaelu karm haamer. Rahval olid napud põhjas ja riik puksata. Andrus Vaarikuga jagavad teiste seas meenutusi Siim Kallas, Juri Nikolajev, Allan Roosileht, Remo Savisaar ja vabariigi president Alar Karis. Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, režissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnõu ja kunstnik Siiri Taimla-Rannala.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: Aastakumnetetagused nostalgilised aastalõpuaskeldused. Meie kunagisse argiellu heidavad satiirilise pilgu Eino Baskin, Ines Aru, Ita Ever, Vello Janson, Milvi Jurgenson, Ülle Kaljuste, Juri Karindi jt. Grigori Gorini jutustuse "Peatage Potapov" instseneeris ja eestindas Mari-Ann Aimla.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Sisi treenib salaja võidusõiduks Georgi vastu, hoolimata Franzi nõudmisest, et ta enam kunagi ei ratsutaks. Vahepeal pakutakse aga Louisile justiitsministri kohta.

programme.desc: Ree makes dishes perfect for freezing for a friend who just had a baby. She cooks pasta casserole, white bean and sausage soup and peanut butter cup bites.

programme.title: Kiinteistohuutokauppa: Taloilla rahoiksi
programme.desc: Tarek ja Christina El Moussa laittavat peliin koko omaisuutensa ja ostavat kiinteistoja huutokaupasta nakematta, mihin rahansa laittavat. Kohteet ovat usein huonossa kunnossa ja vaativat suuren remontin. Kunnostus vie oman aikansa, mutta kiinteistot halutaan pian takaisin markkinoille. Projektien tavoitteena on tietysti tuoda myos voittoa, mutta onnistuvatko Tarek ja Christina tavoitteessaan vaativien kohteiden osalta?

programme.title: Kiinteistohuutokauppa: Taloilla rahoiksi
programme.desc: Tarek ja Christina kohtaavat kalliita, mutta tarpeellisia parannuksia modernisoidessaan pienta kotia.

programme.title: Kiinteistohuutokauppa: Taloilla rahoiksi
programme.desc: Tarek ja Christina kohtaavat kalliita, mutta tarpeellisia parannuksia modernisoidessaan pienta kotia.

programme.title: Remonttipari
programme.desc: Chip ja Joanna Gaines pyorittavat Wacossa, Teksasissa talojen uudistamiseen ja sisustamiseen erikoistunutta Magnolia Homes-yritystaan. Sarjassa seurataan, kuinka rakentamisesta vastaava Chip ja sisustamiseen keskittyva Joanna muokkaavat rapistuneita, mutta runsaasti potentiaalia omaavia taloja edustuskuntoon. Samalla kohenee koko asuinalueen ilme.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kausi 6, osa 1. Parhaat ystavat ja kilpakumppanit Wayde King ja Brett Raymer luotsaavat menestyksekasta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing -perheyritysta, jonka osaava tiimi toteuttaa akvaarioharrastajien villeimmatkin unelmat. Tiimin kasissa merenalainen maailma syntyy niin baaritiskin yhteyteen kuin pyramidin muotoon. (Tanked, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tri Amy saa haasteen, kun paksu Chubbs-katti tarvitsee kiireellista kasvoleikkausta. Ryhma hoitaa myos labradorinnoutajaa, joka on saanut annoksen karkeita hauleja takamukseensa.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tri Amy saa haasteen, kun paksu Chubbs-katti tarvitsee kiireellista kasvoleikkausta. Ryhma hoitaa myos labradorinnoutajaa, joka on saanut annoksen karkeita hauleja takamukseensa.

programme.title: Unelmahaat
programme.desc: Kirsi (o.s. Leponiemi), 40, ja Marko Peuraniemi, 39, alkoivat harrastaa samaan aikaan triathlonia. Tahoillaan naimisissa olleet urheilijat huomasivat pian viihtyvan toistensa seurassa. Kunto parani, ystavyys lujittui, ja ajan kuluessa kumpikin joutui taistelemaan tunteitaan vastaan. Neljan vuoden taistelun voittaja oli rakkaus, kun eras tapahtuma muutti monen elaman. Kaksi viikkoa sen jalkeen pari muutti yhteen. Kirsi ja Marko vihitaan Pinsion kirkossa, ja rennot sadan hengen haajuhlat juhlitaan saman kylan maamiesseuran talolla heinakuisessa helteessa. Mukana juhlimisessa ovat kummankin edelllisesta avioliitosta syntyneet lapset, jotka kaikki yhdessa muodostavat seitseman hengen uusperheen.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: Naimisissa oleva pariskunta joutuu punnitsemaan ihanteellista kuvaa pojastaan, jonka he ovat adoptoineet sotien runtelemasta Eritreasta, kun omistautuneen lukion opettajan halyttava havainto uhkaa hanen asemaansa koulun huippuoppilaana. 109 min. Ohjaus: Julius Onah. Paaoissa: Naomi Watts, Octavia Spencer ja Kelvin Harrison Jr.

programme.title: Kiinteistokaupoilla rahoiksi

Innokkailla tekijoilla on jonkin verran taitoja, mutta sitakin suurempi halu tehda voittoa kauppaamalla remontoidut kohteet eteenpain. Ensimmaisessa jaksossa seurataan Abbyn ja Mattin matkaa.
